Text: *sigh*... Things are getting messy...

Cid is relaxing on Mitsugoshi's private beach when
Claire and Alexia suddenly appear and catch him,
abruptly ending his carefree vacation.

(I could easily escape, but I'm worried about the
consequences... I'll just casually go along with it
and try to make it through...)

Pooch. You think I'm annoying, don't you?
It's written all over your face.
That's not true.

It's an honor to get to enjoy the beach with me,
you know? Try and at least look a little happier.
I'm so happy.
Yeah, yeah. Thanks for that predictable response.

So, what do you want to do, Alexia? Watermelon
Smashing? Swim? Train?

What do you mean by train? Hmm. Well, for now,
I feel like taking a swim...

Oh, but first, check this out. I found something
interesting at the hotel shop.
She shows Cid a bottle filled with liquid.
Is that...sunscreen?

Oh, you know your stuff. Apparently, it helps reduce
sunburn and protects the skin. Mitsugoshi really is
incredible at product development, aren't they?
I-I guess...

It's quite expensive, but no price is too high when
it comes to maintaining beauty, right?

(A perfect strategy for targeting women's sense of
beauty... Ack... They're making zeni off my knowledge
again!)
But there's one small drawback to using it...
A drawback?

It says on the instructions that you need someone to
help apply it to the places you can't reach yourself.
I see.
So, um...I can't apply it on my own...
That's too bad.

Oh! It'd be embarrassing if just the area I missed
got sunburned. Isn't there anyone around who can
help?
Nope.
...Argh!
Hmm?

I'm in a pickle, so you really ought to be lending me
a hand! Jeez...
Oh, I didn't realize...

But...there really isn't any reason I should help
you. If I'm going to, I'd like to be compensated
accordingly.
Seriously, it's always about the zeni with you...
Fine, fine. I'll pay you a coin later, okay?
Great doing business with you!
Alright, lie down on that mat right there.
Oh, you know how to do it? How reassuring.

Saying this, Alexia lies face down on the beach mat
that has already been laid out.
...Like this?
Yeah, just don't move.
O-Okay... I'm kinda nervous...
Here goes.
Y-You better not be touching weird places!
Trust me, I'm not interested...
Hey, no need to be so harsh
Eeeek! It's cold! Why didn't you say so?!
Okay, okay. It's gonna feel a little cold.
Oh! Even when I know, it still feels cold!

I-I'm starting to get a little used to it, b-but you
seem to be spreading it out quite generously...
Well, that's just the way it works.
Alright, next I'll do your waist.

Whew... It feels pretty good... Almost like a
massage...
Alright, next I'll do your feet.

Wait, you're gonna do all the way down there...?
M-My feet are...eeek!

In contrast to the rowdy Alexia, Cid silently applies
sunscreen to her back.
I'm finally starting to get kind of used to it...

That said, Pooch...you're pretty good at this,
considering it's a new product.

Huh? Oh! I-I'm sort of making it up as I go along.
You're giving me too much credit.

(Of course there's the knowledge from my previous
life, but as a shadowbroker, I also possess the
minimum knowledge to handle various situations.)

(This is a move where an unnoticed side character
subtly demonstrates his skills to a named character.
Well played, if I may say so myself...)

Hmm. Maybe it's easier than it looks. You're applying
the perfect pressure.
Whew... Sooo relaxing...
...Okay, done.

...Huh, already?! C-Can't you keep going a little
longer?

Sorry to disappoint you, but this isn't a massage.
Once I finish applying the sunscreen, it's over.
Unless you want me to do the front.
Th-The front...

Alexia imagines herself getting sunscreen applied to
her front side, and her face turns red.
N-Never mind! I can do the front myself!

It's a little embarrassing to have you apply it while
looking at my face...
...Huh? Did you say something?

N-Nothing! Anyway, the way you applied...was pretty
good, you know?
Well, I'll give you your money's worth.

I never expected you to have a skill like this, Pooch.
Want me to hire you as my exclusive masseur?
I'll pass...
Alright, I'll do you next.
Huh? Me? I can do it myself...

What kind of reaction is that? I'm offering to apply
it for you.

Seeing you do it made me want to also try. You don't
mind, do you?
Now you're being honest... Fine, sure.
Pressured by Alexia, Cid reluctantly lies face down.
Hm-hmm! Alright, here goes!
Umm, first, pour some into my hands

Whoops! More came out than I expected! Well, guess
it's not a problem since I'll just apply it anyway!
(I wonder if she's okay...)
(Ugh... She's definitely overapplying it...)
Hup... Hup... H-How's that?
I-It's good...

Glad to hear that. Umm, I'm just gonna spread this...
like this...

...You know, I noticed at the hot springs as well,
but you've got a pretty fit body...
Heh. Well, I do work out.

Wow... You upper body is like an inverted triangle...
I don't think I've ever seen that before...
Hmm...
...Your hands aren't moving.
Oh, I spaced out!
Hup... Hup...

There's quite a bit to applying sunscreen and giving
a massage. It's actually quite fun!
(She's using too much force... It hurts...)

(Well, she seems to be trying her best, so I'll just
compliment her...)

Okay, done! Pretty good for my first time, don't you
think?

(Ugh... It's so sticky... And my body feels a bit
sore...)

It feels...good... Like my fatigue has been
relieved...I think...

Really? S-So long as that's the case. I kinda messed
up at the start, but I'm glad I made up for it.

...You know, I guess I owe you for a lot of things.
Even today, you're indulging me...

I was actually hoping I could do something nice for
you. At least for today, I want us to enjoy each
other's company as equal classmates.
Alexia...

Alright! Now that we're done with the sunscreen,
let's get to swimming!
Yeah, yeah, sure.

Following this, Cid is dragged around by Alexia and
her boundless stamina until the sun sets...
